titles.title: A resolution designating Thursday, November 21, 2013, as "Feed America Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
11/20/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates November 21, 2013, as Feed America Day.
Encourages the people of the United States to sacrifice two meals on Thursday, November 21, 2013, and to donate the money that would have been spent on that food to the religious or charitable organization of their choice for the purpose of feeding the hungry.
